content.p: O3MiSCID stands for Opensource Object Oriented Middleware for Service Connection Introspection and Discovery.
O3MiSCID has been implemented so far in C++, Java and Tcl. See the download page to obtain the desired release.
O3MiSCID is born in the PRIMA project from INRIA. It has been released as an open source project on the DATE.

O3MiSCID is also known as:
Omiscid for short use (in APIs for example)
